mapper.select: select tsTitle from Test_Schedule where tsNo like #{yy} and tsTitle like #{tsClass} order by tsTitle
select distinct S_BONBOO from SCHOOL order by 1
select qName from Qualification where qClass = #{qClass} order by qName

select count(eNo) from TEST_IDENTIFICATION_SLIP where substr(eNo,1,3) = (select distinct substr(S_CODE,1,3) from SCHOOL where S_BONBOO = #{S_BONBOO})
and
qCode = (select qCode from Qualification where qName = #{qName})
and #{tsYear} = substr(eNo,11,2)

select count(ppNo) from PERSONAL_DATA where substr(ppNo,1,3) = (select distinct substr(S_CODE,1,3) from SCHOOL where S_BONBOO = #{S_BONBOO})
and
ppNo in (select eNo from TEST_IDENTIFICATION_SLIP where qCode = (select qCode from Qualification where qName = #{qName}))
and #{tsYear} = substr(ppNo,11,2)
and pAttendance = 'Y'
